text: Karel Fleischner was a male international table tennis player from Czechoslovakia. He won a bronze medal at the 1936 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles, teaming with Adolf Slar. Fleishchner was of Jewish origin, and one of a number of Czech athletes who died in Nazi concentration camps. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Czechoslovak table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists Category:Czech people who died in Nazi concentration camps
title: Karel Fleischner
